text: Nizhegorodka () is a rural locality (a selo) in Zubovsky Selsoviet, Ufimsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 2,541 as of 2010. There are 17 streets. == Geography == It is located 20 km from Ufa, 5 km from Zubovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Ufimsky District
title: Nizhegorodka
